p.font: Orphanage Without Borders harvests the power of technology to connect and engage individuals and resources with the needs of orphan children around the world.

font.p: 1. We gather and present knowledge about the needs of orphan children.
2. We provide a practical source of information for volunteers and organizations, increasing the flow of information.
3. We facilitate the creation of small tangible projects to meet the essential needs of these children.
4. We connect existing resources (organizations, individuals and corporations) to these projects.
5. We empower people to actively participate and make decisions that directly help orphans around the world.
6. We visually represent the projects and resources for anyone who wants to improve the situation.
7. We foster collaboration and crowdsourcing for more efficient results.
8. We promote the exchange of ideas and experiences, bringing donors, organizations and volunteers closer.
9. We provide transparency about the legitimacy of orphanages around the world.
10. We issue updates on the status of projects that are addressing the needs of orphan children.
